news_header: Twelve people were injured in a grenade attack at a bar in Grenoble, France, with two in critical condition. The motive is unclear, but it may be linked to a settling of scores.
news_original_title: Grenade attack in French bar injures 12
news_text: The suspect, who remains unidentified, may have also carried a Kalashnikov. Authorities do not believe it is linked to terrorism but are investigating potential drug trafficking connections. The area remains cordoned off as police and firefighters respond.
